title: A question: If you want URF to be around permanently, are you willing to give resources to Riot?
body:
If you want someone to do something for you, you have to make it worth doing the thing for the other party. 

If Riot makes URF permanent, you are getting something completely for free. I don't see any monetary value in giving someone free stuff.

So I ask, are you willing to pay for permanent URF, in some objective manner? I mean YOU specifically, the one reading this. Not the collective player base. If you are not willing to trade Riot something for something, you have no basis for complaint, and are just trying to get what you want for free.

Let me know if I'm wrong, if you want.
